tool_description: Provides surrounding context for specific verses including chapter summaries and historical background.

context_range.description: Number of surrounding verses to include (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid verse reference: Provide a valid verse citation.
Tradition not supported: Specify a recognized religious tradition.
Context range invalid: Range must be between 1 and 10 verses.
usage: Provide verse_reference and tradition; optionally set context_range. Returns the verse with surrounding context and background information.

chapter_summary.description: Summary of the chapter containing the verse
